body:
Comment 6 by **santucco**: 
Should a retest of value of req.Header in src/pkg/http/client.go:128,130 be removed?
And I actually don't understand, why the initialization of reg.Header so complex:
req.Header = Header(make(map[string][]string))
instead of
req.Header = make(Header)?
In case of changing type of Header this initialization will be wrong...
